## ğŸ“Š Visualise Climate Risk

```{r}
ggplot(vuln_df, aes(x = reorder(district, climate_index), y = climate_index)) +

  coord_flip() +
  labs(
    title = "Climate Vulnerability Index by District",
    x = "District",
    y = "Vulnerability Index"

  theme_minimal()
```
